amendment.description: To provide findings related to the President's constitutional authority to use military force to protect the United States and United States interests.

action.text: Amendment SA 9 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 73.

Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Cruz. (consideration: CR S982-983) To provide findings related to the President's constitutional authority to use military force to protect the United States and United States interests.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Cruz.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 9 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 73.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 9 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 73.
